        public static boolean kingCheck​(java.lang.String color)
        given a color, finds it's king, and sees if it is in check
        Parameters:
        color - This is the color of the king being searched for and checked
        Returns:
        boolean This returns whether or not the king of the color requested is in check

      • noLegalMoves

        public static boolean noLegalMoves​(java.lang.String color)
        checks if there are any legal moves a player can make given a color
        Parameters:
        color - This is the color of the player who's legal moves are searched
        Returns:
        boolean This returns whether or not the selected player has any legal moves left to make

      • executeInstruction

        public static boolean executeInstruction​(java.lang.String instruction)
        given user input, this method tries to execute the instruction and lets the caller know if it was executed successfully or not
        Parameters:
        instruction - This is the user instruction that the method tries to execute
        Returns:
        boolean This is where the method tells the caller if the instruction was executed successfully or not
